PageTitle: peer filter-policy import (BGP view/BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view)(IPv4)
FuncDef:
The peer filter-policy import command configures an ACL-based policy for filtering BGP routes received from a specified peer group.
The undo peer filter-policy import command cancels this configuration. The peer filter-policy import command configures an ACL-based policy for filtering BGP routes received from a specified peer group. The undo peer filter-policy import command cancels this configuration. By default, no filtering policy is configured for the routes received from peers.
ParentView: BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view,BGP view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv4 address of a peer.
The value is in the dotted decimal format.

Specifies the number of the basic ACL.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 2999.

Specifies the name of a named basic ACL.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters starting with a letter. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: If you do not want to receive all routes from a peer, you can run the peer filter-policy import command to configure an ACL-based filtering policy to filter the routes received from the peer.
